j:translation_en.body:
As economies around the world rebound from the impacts of the COVID-19 pandemic

large-scale construction projects and a strong steel market are leading to increased demand for iron ore. Iron mining companies and steel manufacturers are capitalizing on this trend, with many expanding their operations to meet the rising demand. The surge in iron ore prices is not only benefiting industry stakeholders but is also serving as an economic barometer, reflecting the vitality of various nations' construction and manufacturing sectors.
j:translation_en.jcr:title: Iron Ore Prices Surge Amidst Global Demand Boom
j:translation_en.teaser: The iron industry is experiencing a significant upturn as iron ore prices surge to multi-year highs. This surge is primarily driven by robust global demand for steel, especially from the construction and infrastructure sectors.

j:translation_fr.body:
As economies around the world rebound from the impacts of the COVID-19 pandemic

large-scale construction projects and a strong steel market are leading to increased demand for iron ore. Iron mining companies and steel manufacturers are capitalizing on this trend, with many expanding their operations to meet the rising demand. The surge in iron ore prices is not only benefiting industry stakeholders but is also serving as an economic barometer, reflecting the vitality of various nations' construction and manufacturing sectors.
j:translation_fr.jcr:title: Iron Ore Prices Surge Amidst Global Demand Boom
j:translation_fr.teaser: The iron industry is experiencing a significant upturn as iron ore prices surge to multi-year highs. This surge is primarily driven by robust global demand for steel, especially from the construction and infrastructure sectors.

j:translation_en.body:
One notable innovation

gaining traction is the use of hydrogen-based direct reduction processes, which produce iron with significantly lower emissions compared to traditional methods. This shift towards sustainability is not only driven by regulatory pressures but also by market demand, as eco-conscious consumers and investors favor companies that prioritize environmental responsibility.
j:translation_en.jcr:title: Sustainability Takes Center Stage in the Iron Industry
j:translation_en.teaser: Amid growing environmental concerns, the iron industry is undergoing a transformation towards more sustainable practices. Key players in the industry are adopting greener technologies and processes to reduce carbon emissions and minimize the environmental impact of iron production.

j:translation_fr.body:
One notable innovation

gaining traction is the use of hydrogen-based direct reduction processes, which produce iron with significantly lower emissions compared to traditional methods. This shift towards sustainability is not only driven by regulatory pressures but also by market demand, as eco-conscious consumers and investors favor companies that prioritize environmental responsibility.
j:translation_fr.jcr:title: Sustainability Takes Center Stage in the Iron Industry
j:translation_fr.teaser: Amid growing environmental concerns, the iron industry is undergoing a transformation towards more sustainable practices. Key players in the industry are adopting greener technologies and processes to reduce carbon emissions and minimize the environmental impact of iron production.

j:translation_en.body:
This situation has prompted

iron-exporting nations to reassess their trade strategies and seek alternative markets. Additionally, steel manufacturers, who rely on a stable supply of iron, are navigating supply chain challenges and fluctuations in production costs. The iron industry faces uncertainties in global trade, necessitating adaptability and strategic planning to mitigate the impact of geopolitical tensions.
j:translation_en.jcr:title: Geopolitical Tensions Affect Global Iron Supply Chain
j:translation_en.teaser: Geopolitical tensions and trade disputes are casting a shadow over the global iron industry's supply chain. Recent trade conflicts, tariffs, and sanctions are disrupting the smooth flow of iron ore and related products across borders.

j:translation_fr.body:
This situation has prompted

iron-exporting nations to reassess their trade strategies and seek alternative markets. Additionally, steel manufacturers, who rely on a stable supply of iron, are navigating supply chain challenges and fluctuations in production costs. The iron industry faces uncertainties in global trade, necessitating adaptability and strategic planning to mitigate the impact of geopolitical tensions.
j:translation_fr.jcr:title: Geopolitical Tensions Affect Global Iron Supply Chain
j:translation_fr.teaser: Geopolitical tensions and trade disputes are casting a shadow over the global iron industry's supply chain. Recent trade conflicts, tariffs, and sanctions are disrupting the smooth flow of iron ore and related products across borders.

Far far away, behind the word mountains, far from the countries Vokalia and Consonantia, there live the blind texts. Separated they live in Bookmarksgrove right at the coast of the Semantics, a large language ocean.

j:translation_en.heading:
John Smith

Free-Template.co Client
j:translation_en.jcr:title: John Smith
j:translation_en.testimonial: ” The Big Oxmox advised her not to do so, because there were thousands of bad Commas, wild Question Marks and devious Semikoli, but the Little Blind Text didn’t listen. She packed her seven versalia, put her initial into the belt and made herself on the way. “

j:translation_en.testimonial: ” Even the all-powerful Pointing has no control about the blind texts it is an almost unorthographic life One day however a small line of blind text by the name of Lorem Ipsum decided to leave for the far World of Grammar. “

j:translation_en.body:
Tutorial brossage de dent

Comment laver les dents de son chien avec les produits Element

j:translation_fr.body:
Tutorial brossage de dent

Comment laver les dents de son chien avec les produits Element

j:translation_en.text:
Des lamelles pour combattre la mauvaise haleine.

Les lamelles pour les dents ELEMENT Fresh aident à lutter contre les problèmes dentaires et particulièrement la mauvaise haleine tout en faisant plaisir à son animal..

Ces lamelles à mâcher présentent une forme en Z qui facilite la saisie et la mastication par votre animal.

Son appétence fera de ces lamelles à mâcher des friandises dont votre animal ne pourra plus se passer.

La Grenade

La grenade lutte contre les causes orales de la mauvaise haleine grâce à son action sur la plaque dentaire.

L'Erythirol

L'erythirol apporte une sensation de fraicheur et améliore de ce fait l'haleine de votre chien en toute circonstance.

L'Inuline

L'inuline agit sur la flore intestinale en rétablissant l'équilibre microbien du tube digestif des chiens.

Visitez Tous Les Univers Element

Accédez à des 100aines de conseils & tutoriaux pour assurer le bien être de tous vos animaux
Découvrez Element

Projects

Far far away, behind the word mountains, far from the countries Vokalia and Consonantia, there live the blind texts. Separated they live in Bookmarksgrove right at the coast of the Semantics, a large language ocean.

j:translation_en.jcr:title: Est-ce que je peux donner plusieurs lamelles dentaires ELEMENT Fresh par jour mon animal ?

j:translation_en.text: L’apport calorique modéré des lamelles à mâcher ELEMENT Fresh permet de proposer ces lamelles dentaires à votre chien comme une friandise. Il est conseillé de donner une lamelle par jour.

j:translation_en.jcr:title: Mon chien vient de subir un dtartrage. Peut-on lui donner des lamelles dentaires ELEMENT Fresh ?

j:translation_en.text: Oui ! L’action mécanique des lamelles dentaires à mâcher ELEMENT Fresh permet de prévenir la formation de tartre de votre animal.
L’innovation ELEMENT Fresh combat les causes d'une mauvaise haleine grâce à trois nouveaux ingrédients

Un format pour chaque taille de chien

Nos produits sont adaptés à la taille de votre animal. Trouver le produit qui correspond à votre animal.

j:translation_en.body:
XS (<5 kg)

Adapté aux plus petits chiens

S (5-10 kg)

Pour les chiens de petite taille

M (10-30 kg)

Pour les chiens de taille intermédiaire

L (>30 kg)

Pour les plus grandes races

j:translation_en.text:
Découvrez Aussi Notre Gamme Complète Pour l'Hygiène Bucco-Dentaire

Lamelles à mâcher, dentifrice et solution buvable anti-tartre.

j:translation_en.heading: Pack Suite Dentaire Pack Suite Dentaire
j:translation_en.jcr:title: Pack Suite Dentaire Pack Suite Dentaire
